channel.title: Toronto Ontario on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Toronto Ontario on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: A tale of two Toronto mayors: @ToMayorFrod and @ToMayorFord
item.description: Toronto, Ontario is coated in ice tonight. A severe winter ice storm slowing the city to a slippery crawl, with widespread power outages. It's a city in crisis. Mayor Rob Frod of Toronto is not the Mayor of Toronto; it's a Twitter parody account, prepared for the purpose of poking fun at Mayor Rob Ford. A tale of two different worlds: One a joke and the other reality: @TOMayorFord and @TOMayorFrod The later proving the difference.

item.title: July 8, 2013 Toronto flooding
item.description: The streets of Toronto are full of water as over 100 mm of rain (about 4 inches) has fallen in some areas. Meteorologists are making comparisons with Hurricane Hazel, which flooded the area in 1954. Some of the best brief accounts are on Twitter, using the various hashtags #TOflood, #floodTO, #TOstorm, #stormTO, and #darkTO. I listened to CBC Radio 1 Toronto for a while to get a sense for how bad it is.
